trans-unit.source: But there's a third way: Delegated types. With this approach, the “superclass” is a concrete class that is represented by its own table, where all the superclass attributes that are shared amongst all the “subclasses” are stored. And then each of the subclasses have their own individual tables for additional attributes that are particular to their implementation. This is similar to what's called multi-table inheritance in Django, but instead of actual inheritance, this approach uses delegation to form the hierarchy and share responsibilities.

But this approach becomes increasingly impractical as the table size increases, since Customer.all.each instructs Active Record to fetch the entire table in a single pass, build a model object per row, and then keep the entire array of model objects in memory. Indeed, if we have a large number of records, the entire collection may exceed the amount of memory available.

But this approach becomes increasingly impractical as the table size increases, since User.all.each instructs Active Record to fetch the entire table in a single pass, build a model object per row, and then keep the entire array of model objects in memory. Indeed, if we have a large number of records, the entire collection may exceed the amount of memory available.

trans-unit.source: By default, save! always runs validations. If any of them fail ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid gets raised, and the record won't be saved. However, if you supply validate: false, validations are bypassed altogether. See ActiveRecord::Validations for more information.

trans-unit.source: By default, Active Record uses some naming conventions to find out how the mapping between models and database tables should be created. Rails will pluralize your class names to find the respective database table. So, for a class Book, you should have a database table called books. The Rails pluralization mechanisms are very powerful, being capable of pluralizing (and singularizing) both regular and irregular words. When using class names composed of two or more words, the model class name should follow the Ruby conventions, using the CamelCase form, while the table name must contain the words separated by underscores. Examples:

trans-unit.source: By default, Rails includes an unobtrusive scripting adapter, which adds a header called X-CSRF-Token with the security token on every non-GET Ajax call. Without this header, non-GET Ajax requests won't be accepted by Rails. When using another library to make Ajax calls, it is necessary to add the security token as a default header for Ajax calls in your library. To get the token, have a look at <meta name='csrf-token' content='THE-TOKEN'> tag printed by <%= csrf_meta_tags %> in your application view.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Rails包括一个不引人注目的脚本适配器，该适配器在每个非GET Ajax调用上添加一个名为 X-CSRF-Token 的标头以及安全性令牌。如果没有此标头，Rails将不会接受非GET Ajax请求。当使用另一个库进行Ajax调用时，有必要将安全令牌添加为库中Ajax调用的默认标头。要获取令牌，请在应用程序视图中查看由 <%= csrf_meta_tags %> 打印的< <meta name='csrf-token' content='THE-TOKEN'> 标签。

trans-unit.source: By default, Rails logs all requests being made to the web application. But log files can be a huge security issue, as they may contain login credentials, credit card numbers et cetera. When designing a web application security concept, you should also think about what will happen if an attacker got (full) access to the web server. Encrypting secrets and passwords in the database will be quite useless, if the log files list them in clear text. You can filter certain request parameters from your log files by appending them to config.filter_parameters in the application configuration. These parameters will be marked [FILTERED] in the log.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Rails记录对Web应用程序发出的所有请求。但是日志文件可能是一个巨大的安全问题，因为它们可能包含登录凭据，信用卡号等。在设计Web应用程序安全性概念时，您还应该考虑如果攻击者获得（完全）Web服务器访问权限，将会发生什么情况。如果日志文件以明文形式列出，则对数据库中的机密和密码进行加密将毫无用处。您可以通过将日志文件中的某些请求参数附加到应用程序配置中的 config.filter_parameters 来对其进行过滤。这些参数将在日志中标记为[FILTERED]。

trans-unit.source: By default, Rails renders views by first rendering the template and then the layout. The response is sent to the client after the whole template is rendered, all queries are made, and the layout is processed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,Rails 渲染视图的方式是先渲染模板,再渲染布局。在渲染完整个模板、进行所有查询、处理完布局之后,才会向客户端发送响应。

trans-unit.source: By default, Rails uses String#camelize to know which constant should a given file or directory name define. For example, posts_controller.rb should define PostsController because that is what "posts_controller".camelize returns.

trans-unit.source: By default, an InboundEmail that has been successfully processed will be incinerated after 30 days. This ensures you're not holding on to people's data willy-nilly after they may have canceled their accounts or deleted their content. The intention is that after you've processed an email, you should have extracted all the data you needed and turned it into domain models and content on your side of the application. The InboundEmail simply stays in the system for the extra time to provide debugging and forensics options.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,已成功处理的InboundEmail将在30天后被焚烧。这确保了在人们可能已经注销了他们的账户或删除了他们的内容之后,你不会随意地保留他们的数据。这样做的目的是,在你处理完一封邮件后,你应该已经提取了所有需要的数据,并在你的应用端将其转化为域模型和内容。InboundEmail只是在系统中多停留一段时间,提供调试和取证选项。

trans-unit.source: By default, only the ApplicationController in a Rails application inherits from ActionController::Base. All other controllers inherit from ApplicationController. trans-unit.source: By default, records are fetched in ascending order of the primary key. The :start option allows you to configure the first ID of the sequence whenever the lowest ID is not the one you need. This would be useful, for example, if you wanted to resume an interrupted batch process, provided you saved the last processed ID as a checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，记录以主键的升序获取。的 :start 选项允许您配置序列的第一个ID，只要最低ID是不是你需要的人。例如，如果您想恢复被中断的批处理，这将很有用，前提是您将最后处理的ID保存为检查点。

trans-unit.source: By default, running bin/rails test won't run your system tests. Make sure to run bin/rails test:system to actually run them. You can also run bin/rails test:all to run all tests, including system tests.

trans-unit.source: By default, save always runs validations. If any of them fail the action is cancelled and save returns false, and the record won't be saved. However, if you supply validate: false, validations are bypassed altogether. See ActiveRecord::Validations for more information.

trans-unit.source: By default, the generated form element has a class name of button_to to allow styling of the form itself and its children. You can also disable the button by passing disabled: true in html_options. If you are using RESTful routes, you can pass the :method to change the HTTP verb used to submit the form.

CDN stands for Content Delivery Network, they are primarily designed to cache assets all over the world so that when a browser requests the asset, a cached copy will be geographically close to that browser. If you are serving assets directly from your Rails server in production, the best practice is to use a CDN in front of your application.
trans-unit.target: CDN代表Content Delivery Network，它们的主要目的是在全球范围内缓存资产，以便当浏览器请求资产时，缓存的副本将在地理位置上接近该浏览器。如果直接在生产中从Rails服务器提供资产，则最佳实践是在应用程序前面使用CDN。

CRUD is an acronym for the four verbs we use to operate on data: Create, Read, Update and Delete. Active Record automatically creates methods to allow an application to read and manipulate data stored within its tables.
trans-unit.target: CRUD是我们用来对数据进行操作的四个动词的缩写：Ç reate，- [R EAD，ù PDATE和d elete。Active Record自动创建方法，以允许应用程序读取和操作存储在其表中的数据。

trans-unit.source: CRUD, Verbs, and Actions
CRUD: Reading and Writing Data
CRUDit Where CRUDit Is Due
CSRF Countermeasures

CSRF appears very rarely in CVE (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) - less than 0.1% in 2006 - but it really is a 'sleeping giant' [Grossman]. This is in stark contrast to the results in many security contract works - CSRF is an important security issue.
trans-unit.target: CSRF在CVE（常见漏洞和披露）中很少出现-2006年不到0.1％-但它确实是一个“沉睡的巨人” [Grossman]。这与许多安全合同工作的结果形成鲜明对比-CSRF是一个重要的安全问题。

trans-unit.source: CSRF protection from remote <script> tags
CSRF protection is turned on with the protect_from_forgery method. By default protect_from_forgery protects your session with :null_session method, which provides an empty session during request.
trans-unit.target: CSRF保护是通过 protect_from_forgery 方法打开的。默认情况下， protect_from_forgery 使用 :null_session 方法保护您的会话，该方法在请求期间提供一个空会话。

trans-unit.source: CSS Compression
CSS Injection

CSS Injection is explained best by the well-known MySpace Samy worm. This worm automatically sent a friend request to Samy (the attacker) simply by visiting his profile. Within several hours he had over 1 million friend requests, which created so much traffic that MySpace went offline. The following is a technical explanation of that worm.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知的MySpace Samy蠕虫最好地解释了CSS注入。该蠕虫仅通过访问他的个人资料就自动向Samy（攻击者）发送了一个好友请求。在几个小时内，他收到了超过100万个好友请求，这产生了如此多的流量，以至于MySpace脱机了。以下是该蠕虫的技术说明。

trans-unit.source: CYAN
Cache Keys
Cache Stores
Cache fragments of a view if condition is true
trans-unit.target: 如果 condition 为真，则缓存视图的片段

trans-unit.source: Cache fragments of a view unless condition is true
trans-unit.target: 除非 condition 为真，否则缓存视图的片段

trans-unit.source: Cache fragments will also be expired when the view fragment changes (e.g., the HTML in the view changes). The string of characters at the end of the key is a template tree digest. It is a hash digest computed based on the contents of the view fragment you are caching. If you change the view fragment, the digest will change, expiring the existing file.
trans-unit.target: 当视图片段发生变化时(如视图中的HTML发生变化),缓存片段也会过期。密钥末尾的字符串是模板树摘要。它是根据您正在缓存的视图片段的内容计算的哈希摘要。如果你改变了视图片段,摘要也会改变,使现有的文件失效。

trans-unit.source: Cache or yield the block. The cache is supposed to never expire.
trans-unit.target: 缓存或屈服块。缓存应该是永远不会过期的。

trans-unit.source: Cache reads and writes never raise exceptions; they just return nil instead, behaving as if there was nothing in the cache. To gauge whether your cache is hitting exceptions, you may provide an error_handler to report to an exception gathering service. It must accept three keyword arguments: method, the cache store method that was originally called; returning, the value that was returned to the user, typically nil; and exception, the exception that was rescued.
trans-unit.target: 缓存读取和写入永不引发异常；它们只是返回 nil ，好像缓存中什么也没有。为了评估您的缓存是否遇到异常，您可以提供一个 error_handler 来报告异常收集服务。它必须接受三个关键字参数： method ，最初调用的缓存存储方法； returning ，返回给用户的值，通常为 nil ；和 exception ，被拯救的异常。

trans-unit.source: Cache stores like Memcached will automatically delete old cache files.
trans-unit.target: 像Memcached这样的缓存商店会自动删除旧的缓存文件。

trans-unit.source: Cache stores may add their own keys
trans-unit.target: 缓存存储可以添加自己的键

trans-unit.source: CacheHelper

Cached data larger than 1kB are compressed by default. To turn off compression, pass compress: false to the initializer or to individual fetch or write method calls. The 1kB compression threshold is configurable with the :compress_threshold option, specified in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下压缩大于1kB的缓存数据。要关闭压缩，请将 compress: false 传递给初始化程序或单独的 fetch 或 write 方法调用。1kB压缩阈值可通过 :compress_threshold 选项配置，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Caches that implement LocalCache will be backed by an in-memory cache for the duration of a block. Repeated calls to the cache for the same key will hit the in-memory cache for faster access.
Caches that implement LocalCache will be backed by an in-memory cache for the duration of a block. Repeated calls to the cache for the same key will hit the in-memory cache for faster access.
trans-unit.target: 实现LocalCache的缓存将在一个块的持续时间内由内存中的缓存支持。重复调用同一键的高速缓存将访问内存高速缓存，以加快访问速度。

trans-unit.source: Caches the number of belonging objects on the associate class through the use of CounterCache::ClassMethods#increment_counter and CounterCache::ClassMethods#decrement_counter. The counter cache is incremented when an object of this class is created and decremented when it's destroyed. This requires that a column named #{table_name}_count (such as comments_count for a belonging Comment class) is used on the associate class (such as a Post class) - that is the migration for #{table_name}_count is created on the associate class (such that Post.comments_count will return the count cached, see note below). You can also specify a custom counter cache column by providing a column name instead of a true/false value to this option (e.g., counter_cache: :my_custom_counter.) Note: Specifying a counter cache will add it to that model's list of readonly attributes using attr_readonly.

Caches the number of belonging objects on the associate class through the use of ActiveRecord::CounterCache::ClassMethods#increment_counter and ActiveRecord::CounterCache::ClassMethods#decrement_counter. The counter cache is incremented when an object of this class is created and decremented when it's destroyed. This requires that a column named #{table_name}_count (such as comments_count for a belonging Comment class) is used on the associate class (such as a Post class) - that is the migration for #{table_name}_count is created on the associate class (such that Post.comments_count will return the count cached, see note below). You can also specify a custom counter cache column by providing a column name instead of a true/false value to this option (e.g., counter_cache: :my_custom_counter.) Note: Specifying a counter cache will add it to that model's list of readonly attributes using attr_readonly.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用ActiveRecord :: CounterCache :: ClassMethods＃increment_counter和ActiveRecord :: CounterCache :: ClassMethods＃decrement_counter在关联类上缓存属于对象的数量。创建此类的对象时，计数器缓存会增加；销毁此类对象时，计数器缓存会减少。这要求在关联类（例如Post类）上使用名为 #{table_name}_count 的列（例如所属的Comment类的 comments_count ）-即在关联上创建 #{table_name}_count 的迁移类（例如 Post.comments_count 将返回缓存的计数，请参见下面的注释）。您还可以通过为此选项提供列名而不是 true / false 值来指定自定义计数器缓存列（例如， counter_cache: :my_custom_counter 。）注意：指定计数器缓存将使用以下方式将其添加到该模型的只读属性列表中： attr_readonly 。

trans-unit.source: Caching
Caching in Development
Caching is a cheap way of speeding up slow applications by keeping the result of calculations, renderings, and database calls around for subsequent requests.
trans-unit.target: 缓存是一种廉价的方式,通过将计算、渲染和数据库调用的结果保留在周围供后续请求使用,来加快缓慢的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Caching is often the most effective way to boost an application's performance. Through caching, web sites running on a single server with a single database can sustain a load of thousands of concurrent users.
trans-unit.target: 缓存通常是提升应用程序性能的最有效方法。通过缓存,在一台服务器上运行的网站和单一数据库可以承受成千上万的并发用户的负载。

trans-unit.source: Caching means to store content generated during the request-response cycle and to reuse it when responding to similar requests.
trans-unit.target: 缓存是指存储在请求-响应周期内产生的内容,并在响应类似请求时重复使用。

trans-unit.source: Callback Classes
Callback Registration
Callbacks
Callbacks Overview
Callbacks allow you to trigger logic before or after an alteration of an object's state.
trans-unit.target: 回调允许您在对象状态改变之前或之后触发逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks are hooks into the life cycle of an Active Record object that allow you to trigger logic before or after a change in the object state. This can be used to make sure that associated and dependent objects are deleted when ActiveRecord::Base#destroy is called (by overwriting before_destroy) or to massage attributes before they're validated (by overwriting before_validation). As an example of the callbacks initiated, consider the ActiveRecord::Base#save call for a new record:

Callbacks are hooks into the life cycle of an Active Record object that allow you to trigger logic before or after an alteration of the object state. This can be used to make sure that associated and dependent objects are deleted when ActiveRecord::Base#destroy is called (by overwriting before_destroy) or to massage attributes before they're validated (by overwriting before_validation). As an example of the callbacks initiated, consider the ActiveRecord::Base#save call for a new record:
trans-unit.target: 回调是Active Record对象生命周期的挂钩，允许您在更改对象状态之前或之后触发逻辑。这可以用来确保在调用ActiveRecord :: Base＃destroy时（通过覆盖 before_destroy ）删除关联的对象和从属对象，或者用于在验证属性之前对属性进行按摩（通过覆盖 before_validation ）。作为发起的回调的示例，请考虑对新记录的ActiveRecord :: Base＃save调用：

trans-unit.source: Callbacks are invoked.

Callbacks are methods that get called at certain moments of an object's life cycle. With callbacks it is possible to write code that will run whenever an Active Record object is created, saved, updated, deleted, validated, or loaded from the database.
trans-unit.target: 回调是在对象生命周期的某些时刻被调用的方法。有了回调,就可以编写代码,当一个Active Record对象被创建、保存、更新、删除、验证或从数据库中加载时,这些代码就会运行。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks are skipped.
Callbacks can also be registered to only fire on certain life cycle events:
trans-unit.target: 也可以注册回调,使其只在特定的生命周期事件中触发。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks in Action Mailer are implemented using AbstractController::Callbacks, so you can define and configure callbacks in the same manner that you would use callbacks in classes that inherit from ActionController::Base.
trans-unit.target: Action Mailer中的回调是使用 AbstractController::Callbacks ，因此您可以使用与从 ActionController::Base 继承的类中使用回调相同的方式定义和配置回调。

trans-unit.source: Callbacks work through model relationships, and can even be defined by them. Suppose an example where a user has many articles. A user's articles should be destroyed if the user is destroyed. Let's add an after_destroy callback to the User model by way of its relationship to the Article model:

Calling content_for stores a block of markup in an identifier for later use. In order to access this stored content in other templates, helper modules or the layout, you would pass the identifier as an argument to content_for.
trans-unit.target: 调用 content_for 将标记块存储在标识符中，以备后用。为了在其他模板，助手模块或布局中访问此存储的内容，您可以将标识符作为参数传递给 content_for 。

trans-unit.source: Calling content_for stores a block of markup in an identifier for later use. You can make subsequent calls to the stored content in other templates or the layout by passing the identifier as an argument to yield.
trans-unit.target: 调用 content_for 将标记块存储在标识符中，以备后用。您可以通过将标识符作为 yield 的参数来对其他模板或布局中的存储内容进行后续调用。

trans-unit.target: 多次调用具有相同 names define_callbacks 将覆盖先前在 set_callback 中注册的回调。

trans-unit.source: Calling draw(:admin) inside the Rails.application.routes.draw block itself will try to load a route file that has the same name as the argument given (admin.rb in this case). The file needs to be located inside the config/routes directory or any sub-directory (i.e. config/routes/admin.rb or config/routes/external/admin.rb).
Calling dup or clone on safe strings yields safe strings.
trans-unit.target: 在安全字符串上调用 dup 或 clone 会产生安全字符串。

trans-unit.source: Calling params in your application will now return an object instead of a hash. If your parameters are already permitted, then you will not need to make any changes. If you are using map and other methods that depend on being able to read the hash regardless of permitted? you will need to upgrade your application to first permit and then convert to a hash.
trans-unit.target: 现在，在您的应用程序中调用 params 将返回一个对象，而不是哈希。如果您的参数已被允许，则无需进行任何更改。如果您正在使用 map 和其他依赖于无论是否 permitted? 读取哈希值的方法？您将需要先将应用程序升级为允许，然后再转换为哈希。

trans-unit.target: 在没有所有权的情况下调用连接上的方法,要受到底层方法的线程安全保证。连接适配器类上的许多方法本质上是多线程不安全的。

trans-unit.source: Catch the exception and reschedule job for re-execution after so many seconds, for a specific number of attempts. If the exception keeps getting raised beyond the specified number of attempts, the exception is allowed to bubble up to the underlying queuing system, which may have its own retry mechanism or place it in a holding queue for inspection.
trans-unit.target: 捕获异常,并在这么多秒后重新安排作业重新执行,具体的尝试次数。如果异常一直被提出,超过了指定的尝试次数,就会允许异常冒到底层的队列系统,底层队列系统可能有自己的重试机制,也可能把它放在一个保持队列中进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Channel Test Case

Channel instances are long-lived. A channel object will be instantiated when the cable consumer becomes a subscriber, and then lives until the consumer disconnects. This may be seconds, minutes, hours, or even days. That means you have to take special care not to do anything silly in a channel that would balloon its memory footprint or whatever. The references are forever, so they won't be released as is normally the case with a controller instance that gets thrown away after every request.
trans-unit.target: 频道实例是长期存在的。当有线电视消费者成为用户时,一个频道对象将被实例化,然后一直到消费者断开连接为止。这可能是几秒、几分钟、几小时,甚至几天。这意味着你必须特别小心,不要在频道中做任何傻事,以免膨胀它的内存占用或其他什么。引用是永远的,所以它们不会像通常情况下控制器实例在每次请求后被扔掉那样被释放。

trans-unit.source: Choosing Controller Modules
Choosing Middleware

Choosing which way to build a many-to-many relationship is not always simple. If you need to work with the relationship model as its own entity, use has_many:through. Use has_and_belongs_to_many when working with legacy schemas or when you never work directly with the relationship itself.

Choosing which way to build a many-to-many relationship is not always simple. If you need to work with the relationship model as its own entity, use has_many:through. Use has_and_belongs_to_many when working with legacy schemas or when you never work directly with the relationship itself.

trans-unit.source: Client-Side Components

Client-side validations can be useful, but are generally unreliable if used alone. If they are implemented using JavaScript, they may be bypassed if JavaScript is turned off in the user's browser. However, if combined with other techniques, client-side validation can be a convenient way to provide users with immediate feedback as they use your site.
trans-unit.target: 客户端验证可能是有用的,但如果单独使用,通常是不可靠的。如果它们是使用JavaScript实现的,那么如果用户的浏览器关闭了JavaScript,它们可能会被绕过。然而,如果与其他技术相结合,客户端验证可以成为一种方便的方式,在用户使用你的网站时为他们提供即时反馈。

Command class for carrying out the actual incineration of the InboundMail that's been scheduled for removal. Concerns are a way to make large controllers or models easier to understand and manage. This also has the advantage of reusability when multiple models (or controllers) share the same concerns. Concerns are implemented using modules that contain methods representing a well-defined slice of the functionality that a model or controller is responsible for. In other languages, modules are often known as mixins.

trans-unit.source: Conditional Callbacks
Conditional GET support
Conditional GET support.

Conditional GETs are a feature of the HTTP specification that provide a way for web servers to tell browsers that the response to a GET request hasn't changed since the last request and can be safely pulled from the browser cache.
trans-unit.target: 有条件的GET是HTTP规范的一个特性,它为Web服务器提供了一种方式来告诉浏览器,GET请求的响应在上次请求后没有改变,可以安全地从浏览器缓存中提取。

trans-unit.source: Conditional GETs: Rails handles conditional GET (ETag and Last-Modified) processing request headers and returning the correct response headers and status code. All you need to do is use the stale? check in your controller, and Rails will handle all of the HTTP details for you.
trans-unit.target: 条件GET：Rails处理条件 GET （ ETag 和 Last-Modified ）处理请求标头，并返回正确的响应标头和状态代码。您需要做的只是使用 stale? 检查您的控制器，Rails将为您处理所有HTTP详细信息。

Conditions

Conditions can either be specified as a string, array, or hash representing the WHERE-part of an SQL statement. The array form is to be used when the condition input is tainted and requires sanitization. The string form can be used for statements that don't involve tainted data. The hash form works much like the array form, except only equality and range is possible. Examples:
trans-unit.target: 条件可以指定为字符串、数组或哈希,代表SQL语句的WHERE部分。数组形式是在条件输入被污染并需要净化的情况下使用的。字符串形式可以用于不涉及污点数据的语句。哈希形式的工作原理和数组形式很像,只是只可能有平等和范围。举例说明。

Connections

Connections are instances of ApplicationCable::Connection, which extends ActionCable::Connection::Base. In ApplicationCable::Connection, you authorize the incoming connection, and proceed to establish it if the user can be identified.
Connections are instances of ApplicationCable::Connection. In this class, you authorize the incoming connection, and proceed to establish it if the user can be identified.
trans-unit.target: 连接是 ApplicationCable::Connection 实例。在此类中，您授权传入连接，并在可以识别用户的情况下继续建立连接。

trans-unit.source: Connections are usually created through ActiveRecord::Base.establish_connection and retrieved by ActiveRecord::Base.connection. All classes inheriting from ActiveRecord::Base will use this connection. But you can also set a class-specific connection. For example, if Course is an ActiveRecord::Base, but resides in a different database, you can just say Course.establish_connection and Course and all of its subclasses will use this connection instead.

Connections are usually created through ActiveRecord::Base.establish_connection and retrieved by ActiveRecord::Base.connection. All classes inheriting from ActiveRecord::Base will use this connection. But you can also set a class-specific connection. For example, if Course is an ActiveRecord::Base, but resides in a different database, you can just say Course.establish_connection and Course and all of its subclasses will use this connection instead.
trans-unit.target: 连接通常通过ActiveRecord :: Base。Establishment_connection创建，并通过ActiveRecord :: Base.connection检索。从ActiveRecord :: Base继承的所有类都将使用此连接。但是您也可以设置特定于类的连接。例如，如果Course是ActiveRecord :: Base，但驻留在不同的数据库中，则可以只说 Course.establish_connection 和Course及其所有子类都将使用此连接。

Constant Reloading
Constant assignment has a special rule to make that happen: if the object being assigned is an anonymous class or module, Ruby sets the object's name to the name of the constant.
trans-unit.target: 常量赋值有一个特殊的规则来实现:如果被赋值的对象是一个匿名的类或模块,Ruby会将对象的名字设置为常量的名字。

trans-unit.source: Constant autoloading is thread-safe in zeitwerk mode. For example, you can now autoload in multi-threaded scripts executed by the runner command.
trans-unit.target: 在 zeitwerk 模式下，恒定的自动加载是线程安全的。例如，您现在可以自动加载由 runner 命令执行的多线程脚本。

trans-unit.source: Constant autoloading is triggered on demand and therefore code that uses a certain constant may have it already defined or may trigger an autoload. That depends on the execution path and it may vary between runs.
trans-unit.target: 常量的自动加载是按需触发的,因此使用某个常量的代码可能已经定义了它,也可能会触发自动加载。这取决于执行路径,而且在运行之间可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Constant name resolution by constantize starts always at the top-level Object even if there is no leading "::".
trans-unit.target: 即使没有前导“ ::”，通过 constantize 量化进行常量名称解析始终始于顶级 Object 。

trans-unit.source: Constants
Constants Refresher
Constants are Stored in Modules
Constants belong to modules in a very literal sense. Classes and modules have a constant table; think of it as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 常量在字面意义上属于模块。类和模块都有一个常量表,把它看作是一个哈希表。

trans-unit.source: Constants in deeper places only executed at runtime, like regular method bodies, are also fine because the file defining them will have been eager loaded while booting.
trans-unit.target: 更深层次的地方的常量只在运行时执行,比如常规的方法体,也是可以的,因为定义这些常量的文件会在启动时已经被急切加载。

trans-unit.source: Controller Naming Convention
Controller Specific Assets

Controller actions are protected from Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks by including a token in the rendered HTML for your application. This token is stored as a random string in the session, to which an attacker does not have access. When a request reaches your application, Rails verifies the received token with the token in the session. All requests are checked except GET requests as these should be idempotent. Keep in mind that all session-oriented requests are CSRF protected by default, including JavaScript and HTML requests.
trans-unit.target: 通过在您的应用程序的渲染HTML中包含一个令牌,可以保护控制器操作免受跨站点请求伪造(CSRF)攻击。该令牌作为随机字符串存储在会话中,攻击者无法访问。当请求到达您的应用程序时,Rails 会将收到的令牌与会话中的令牌进行验证。除了GET请求之外,所有请求都会被检查,因为这些请求应该是幂等的。请记住,所有面向会话的请求默认都是CSRF保护的,包括JavaScript和HTML请求。

Controller is automatically inferred
Controller#Action

Controller-level validations can be tempting to use, but often become unwieldy and difficult to test and maintain. Whenever possible, it's a good idea to keep your controllers skinny, as it will make your application a pleasure to work with in the long run.
trans-unit.target: 控制器级的验证可能很诱人,但往往变得笨重,难以测试和维护。只要有可能,让你的控制器保持精简是个好主意,因为从长远来看,这将使你的应用程序更容易使用。

trans-unit.source: Controllers
Controllers need to be aware of any redefinition of to_param because when a request like that comes in "357-john-smith" is the value of params[:id].
trans-unit.target: 控制器需要知道 to_param 的任何重新定义，因为当这样的请求出现在“ 357-john-smith”中时，就是 params[:id] 的值。

trans-unit.source: Controllers passed in using the :controller option will retain their namespace unless it is an absolute one.
trans-unit.target: 使用 :controller 选项传入的控制器将保留其名称空间，除非它是绝对名称空间。
